item.title: Ielts Speak Topics
item.description: 1. What do you do in your free time? [Answer] Well, for the most part, in my leisure time, I’m really into playing my guitar.

item.title: Some People Think Children Have the Freedom to Make Mistakes
item.description: Some people think children have the freedom to make mistakes, while other people believe that adults should prevent children from making mistakes.

item.description: Origin transcript (Here) and audio: Compulsively, you start wondering if maybe you should have forced yourself out of the house, you’re assembling a list of reasons as to why you’re a bum, and you’re questioning the purpose of your very existence.

item.title: France Alphabet and Phonetic
item.description: Because the rules of French pronunciation are fixed, once you start concentrating on them, you don’t even need phonetic symbols once you have learned them.

item.title: BBC One Minute News Dictation #1
item.description: The president of Ukraine says the war with Russia has entered an emotionally difficult stage | after the city of Severodonetsk fell to the Russian army.
